message: Let's split it 60/40, a fair start!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a good deal!
You can do better than that, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway.
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm not going to give it all away!
I'm getting impatient, Bob. I think I deserve a bigger share now.
I'm not going to give in to your demands, Alice. You're getting closer, but not close enough!
